title: Student daily study & exercise tracker website

requirements.text: Create an authenticated student workspace using Internet Identity so each student can securely access only their own study and exercise data.

quotes: I want to build a web site for students for daily to hadle both exercise and study

acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in and sign out with Internet Identity.
After signing in, the app shows a personalized dashboard (not a generic landing screen).
All read/write operations in the backend are scoped to the authenticated principal.

requirements.text: Implement backend data models and persistence for daily logs that include study items and exercise items, each with status tracking and basic details.

quotes: I want to build a web site for students for daily to hadle both exercise and study

acceptanceCriteria: Backend supports CRUD for daily logs keyed by date for the signed-in user.
Each daily log can store multiple study entries and multiple exercise entries.
Entries support marking completion (done/undone) and updating/deleting an entry.
Data persists across page refreshes and canister upgrades within the template’s default persistence approach.

requirements.text: Build the core UI for managing a student’s day: a dashboard showing today’s study and exercise lists, with forms to add/edit items and controls to mark items complete.

quotes: web site for students for daily to hadle both exercise and study

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays two sections: Study and Exercise, each listing today’s items with completion state.
User can add a new study item and a new exercise item from the dashboard.
User can edit and delete items from the dashboard.
User can toggle an item as complete/incomplete and sees the UI update immediately.

requirements.text: Add a calendar/history view to browse previous days’ logs and quickly copy (duplicate) a prior day’s unfinished items into today.

quotes: daily to hadle both exercise and study

acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate to a history view that lists days with existing logs.
Selecting a day shows that day’s study/exercise items.
User can copy unfinished items from a selected day into today (no duplicates created when copying the same day twice).

requirements.text: Add simple progress insights: show weekly completion summaries for study and exercise (e.g., completed vs total items) and a basic streak indicator.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard (or a dedicated Insights page) shows weekly totals for Study and Exercise (completed/total).
App shows a streak count based on consecutive days with at least one completed item (study or exercise).
Numbers match backend-calculated results for the authenticated user.

requirements.text: Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the student daily planner UI (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent theme is applied to navigation, cards/sections, buttons, forms, and typography.
Theme does not rely on blue/purple as the primary palette.
UI remains accessible with clear contrast for text and interactive elements.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to the frontend and render them in the UI (e.g., in the app header/landing area) from frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored at frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
At least one generated image is visibly used in the UI (header/brand area or sign-in screen).
Images are loaded directly as static assets (not served or transformed by the backend).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui; compose them instead.
Do not edit immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts) or frontend/src/main.tsx; integrate via new components/hooks as needed.
nonGoals: Integration with external calendars, maps, social media APIs, or third-party auth providers beyond Internet Identity.
Push notifications, email, or SMS reminders.

required: Friendly study-and-fitness mascot illustration, flat style, warm colors (student-mascot.dim_512x512.png)
Minimal app logo mark combining a book and dumbbell icon, flat monochrome (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Simple favicon version of the logo mark (favicon.dim_64x64.png)
